title: Talika Lash Conditioning Cleanser - 4.06 oz
description: Clean-Up CrewSoft and refreshing, this oil-free eye makeup remover is the real deal. Eliminating all traces of makeup-including waterproof mascara-Talika's Oil-Free Lash Conditioning Cleanser is gentle on sensitive eyes as it conditions lashes.Oil-free eye makeup removerWorks on waterproof mascaraIdeal for sensitive eyesBest Suited For:All skin typesEssential Elements:Conflower extract has softening effects and works as an astringent, while silk proteins offer in-depth treatent to improve lash structure.Free Of:OilsFor Best Effect:Use as directed.

title: Dermablend Smooth Indulgence Foundation SPF 20, Nude Beige, 1 Ounce
description: This lightweight formula with twice the coverage of a classic foundation lasts for up 12 hours of wear. A soft touch to skin, Smooth Indulgence Foundation evens complexion and won't enhance fine lines or surface imperfections.    Benefits:  Has a lightweight, blendable texture.  Provides skin with a flawless matte finish.  Leaves skin radiant, smooth and comfortable all day long.

title: Wig Cap (2 Pack) Color Neutral
description: Manages and hides hair. Secures hair under wigs without pins. Designed to give a comfortable fit. Enables hair breathability.
